ValidationRule.description: AEs and ADRs are unable to change Contact Status from Demo Scheduled to New, Attempting, or Contact Established unless they delete their Demo Scheduled Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'New'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Attempting'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Contact Established')), NOT(ISBLANK(Scheduled_Demo_Date__c)), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, 'SMB'), ISBLANK(ADR_Transfer_By__c), ISBLANK(Hot_Transfer_To__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'List Import (no prior engagement)'), ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Outbound call / email / linkedin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: AEs and ADRs are unable to change Contact Status from Demo Scheduled to New, Attempting, or Contact Established unless they delete their Demo Scheduled Date
